SEARCH
Package com.example.haboob

Class QRCode

java.lang.Object
com.example.haboob.QRCode
public class QRCode extends Object
QRCode class for generating and managing QR codes based on event IDs Uses ZXing library to generate QR code bitmaps

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    QRCode()
    Empty constructor for Firebase Firestore serialization
    QRCode(String eventID)
    Constructor that takes event ID and generates QR code

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    android.graphics.Bitmap
    generateQRCode(int size)
    Generates a QR code bitmap from the event ID as a deep link The QR code encodes a URI that will open the app to this specific event
    android.graphics.Bitmap
    getBitmap(int size)
    Gets the cached QR code bitmap, or generates it if not already created
    android.graphics.Bitmap
    getCachedBitmap()
    Gets the cached QR code bitmap without generating a new one
    String
    getEventID()
    Gets the event ID encoded in this QR code
    boolean
    hasValidData()
    Checks if the QR code has valid data
    android.graphics.Bitmap
    regenerate(int size)
    Regenerates the QR code bitmap with a new size
    void
    setEventID(String eventID)
    Sets the event ID for this QR code Note: This will invalidate any cached QR code bitmap

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • QRCode

      public QRCode()
      Empty constructor for Firebase Firestore serialization

    • QRCode

      public QRCode(String eventID)
      Constructor that takes event ID and generates QR code
      Parameters:
      eventID - The unique event ID to encode in the QR code

  • Method Details

    • generateQRCode

      public android.graphics.Bitmap generateQRCode(int size)
      Generates a QR code bitmap from the event ID as a deep link The QR code encodes a URI that will open the app to this specific event
      Parameters:
      size - The width and height of the QR code in pixels (recommended: 512 or higher)
      Returns:
      Bitmap of the QR code, or null if generation fails

    • getBitmap

      public android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmap(int size)
      Gets the cached QR code bitmap, or generates it if not already created
      Parameters:
      size - The width and height of the QR code in pixels
      Returns:
      Bitmap of the QR code

    • getCachedBitmap

      public android.graphics.Bitmap getCachedBitmap()
      Gets the cached QR code bitmap without generating a new one
      Returns:
      Bitmap of the QR code, or null if not yet generated

    • getEventID

      public String getEventID()
      Gets the event ID encoded in this QR code
      Returns:
      The event ID string

    • setEventID

      public void setEventID(String eventID)
      Sets the event ID for this QR code Note: This will invalidate any cached QR code bitmap
      Parameters:
      eventID - The event ID to encode

    • hasValidData

      public boolean hasValidData()
      Checks if the QR code has valid data
      Returns:
      true if event ID is not null and not empty

    • regenerate

      public android.graphics.Bitmap regenerate(int size)
      Regenerates the QR code bitmap with a new size
      Parameters:
      size - The new width and height in pixels
      Returns:
      The newly generated bitmap
